hadiths.text: Abu Ishaq Shaibani said:I asked 'Abdullah b. Abu Aufi if Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) awarded (the punishment) of stoning (to death). He said: Yes. I said: After Sura al-Nur was revealed or before that? He said: I do not know

chapter.ara-name: باب رَجْمِ الْيَهُودِ أَهْلِ الذِّمَّةِ فِي الزِّنَا
chapter.eng-name: Stoning Jews and Ahl Adh-Dhimmah for Zina
